definition: ephemeral (idiom)
(experienced action marker)
surname Guo
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
cloud/CL:朵[duo3]
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: The original everything you say it is even a vapour.
sentences.chinese: 原來你所說的一切不過都是過眼雲煙。

sentences.english: You say you love me, now all turn into even a vapour.
sentences.chinese: 你說的你愛我，現在全都變成了過眼雲煙。

sentences.english: Even if such life the wealth piles up is also the eye mist.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的人生即便財富堆積如山也不過是過眼雲煙。

sentences.english: Wind and wave has already was vanish quickly.
sentences.chinese: 大風大浪已是過眼雲煙。

sentences.english: But to you, all are fleeting souls.
sentences.chinese: 不過，那對你都是過眼雲煙。

sentences.english: I am not sure this bubble that began six months ago is truly over.
sentences.chinese: 我不確信這場始於半年前的泡沫已經成爲過眼雲煙。

sentences.english: The answer is that the negatives all flutter away.
sentences.chinese: 答案是所有負面消息都將成爲過眼雲煙。

sentences.english: Glory is all well and good but, life is enough.
sentences.chinese: 榮耀只是過眼雲煙，我們曾經活着就夠了。

sentences.english: The blue emotions of the ancients has drowned over time as the past clouds and mist.
sentences.chinese: 古人的蒼涼情懷如過眼雲煙，留在了湮沒的時光裏。
